title: Iraq asks UN to boot out US forces
text: US President Donald Trump announced he will lift sanctions on Turkey after Ankara informed Washington that the ceasefire in Syria will be "permanent." RT's Roman Kosarev reports from Moscow. Meanwhile, Iraq’s military says US troops leaving northeastern Syria don’t have permission to stay in Iraq, contradicting US Defense Secretary Mark Esper’s statement. RT America's Sayeh Tavangar reports. Then former Pentagon official Michael Maloof weighs in. Plus, Abayomi Azikiwe, editor of Pan-African Newswire, provides perspective on the Russia-Africa Summit hosted in Sochi, Russia.
description: US President Donald Trump announced he will lift sanctions on Turkey after Ankara informed Washington that the ceasefire in Syria will be "permanent
